Packet Tracer From Source

Install

  1. Download the files
    Cisco Packet Tracer 6.3 cs.rpi.edu
    Cisco Packet Tracet 7.0 32 bit gdrive | 64 bit gdrive
  2. Extract and configure 
    $ cd /tmp
$ cp ~/Downloads/PacketTracerXX_linux.tar.gz .
$ tar -zxvf PacketTracerXX_linux.tar.gz
$ sudo ./install

Uninstall

$ rm -r /opt/pt
*****
